Name: Inventory Search Bar
Author: Tischel
Punchline: Adds a search bar directly in the inventory window to filter items.
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:
	- Character Inventory
	- Chocobo Saddle
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury


Known Issues:
	- Premium Cocobo Saddle not yet supported
Changelog:
0.2.0.0
- Fixed the search bar being visible on windows that aren't focused which could lead to bad visual overlaps with other windows.
- Fixed not being able to close the inventory windows with the Escape key after focusing on the search bar.
